translations.en: Password should contain at least 5 characters
translations.kin: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba rifite nibura inyuguti 5

translations.en: Password should contain at least one uppercase letter
translations.kin: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kugira inyuguti nini nibura imwe

translations.en: Password should contain at least one symbol
translations.kin: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kugira ikimenyetso nibura kimwe

translations.en: Password should contain at least one digit
translations.kin: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kugira umubare nibura umwe

translations.en: Email or Phone number is required
translations.kin: Imeri cyangwa nimero ya telefoni irakenewe

translations.en: Invalid email or phone number format
translations.kin: Imeri cyangwa nimero ya telefoni yanditswe nabi

translations.en: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a reset code.
translations.kin: Andika imeli yawe hano hanyuma tuzakuganiriza inkuru y'ukubahiriza ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe.
Imeli yo gusubiza ijambo ry'ibanga yoherejwe

translations.en: We have sent a password recover instructions to your email
translations.kin: Tuzakuganiriza inkuru y'ukubahiriza ijambo ry'ibanga ryawe kuri imeli yawe

translations.en: Did not receive the email? check you spam filter or resend
translations.kin: Ntagiye wabonye inkuru? Shyiramo kuri spam cyangwa usangire

translations.en: Please enter your new password below
Password must be at least 6 characters
translations.kin: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba rifite nibura inyuguti 6

translations.en: How can we help you today

translations.kin: Amakuru ku Isano y'IZU Mukorera Umurenge
Amakuru ku Isano y'IZU Mu Mudugudu
Igenzura ry'Izu ku Murenge Kuri Telefoni
Igenzura ry'Izu ku Kagali Kuri Telefoni

translations.en: This module is a high priority for your attention.
translations.kin: Iki cyiciro kiri mu bintu by'ingenzi bikwiye kwitabwaho.

translations.en: This module is a high priority for your attention.
translations.kin: Iki cyiciro kiri mu bintu by'ingenzi bikwiye kwitabwaho.

translations.en: Select the Izu code you want to use
The module you are looking for does not exist
Your submission has been successfully submitted
Your family has been successfully created
Your IZU has been successfully created
Your monitoring has been successfully submitted
Title must be at least 3 characters
translations.kin: Umutwe w'inkuru ugomba kuba ufite nibura inyuguti 3

translations.en: Description must be at least 10 characters
translations.kin: Ibisobanuro by'inkuru bigomba kuba bifite nibura inyuguti 10

translations.en: Comment must be at least 3 characters
translations.kin: Ibisobanuro by'igitekerezo bigomba kuba bifite nibura inyuguti 3

translations.en: Failed to fetch videos. Please try again later.
translations.kin: Ntabashije kubona amavidewo. Mwongere mugerageze nyuma.

translations.en: You are offline. Sync operations require internet connection.
translations.kin: Uri hanze ya murandasi. Guhuza ibikorwa bisaba ihuriro rya murandasi.

translations.en: You are offline. Please connect to the internet and try again.
translations.kin: Uri hanze ya murandasi. Ongera wihurize ku murandasi maze ugerageze nanone.

translations.en: Failed to sync forms and surveys
Failed to sync data. Please check your internet connection and try again.
translations.kin: Kuhuza amakuru byanze. Genzura ihuriro rya murandasi ryawe maze ugerageze nanone.

translations.en: Failed to sync families. Please check your internet connection and try again.
translations.kin: Kuhuza imiryango byanze. Genzura ihuriro rya murandasi ryawe maze ugerageze nanone.

translations.en: Failed to sync izus. Please check your internet connection and try again.
translations.kin: Kuhuza IZU byanze. Genzura ihuriro rya murandasi ryawe maze ugerageze nanone.

translations.en: No network error submissions to retry
translations.kin: Nta makosa ya murandasi agomba kongera kugeragezwa

translations.en: Failed to retry network error submissions
Failed to retry submissions. Please check your internet connection and try again.
translations.kin: Kugerageza ubugira kabiri byanze. Genzura ihuriro rya murandasi ryawe maze ugerageze nanone.

translations.en: Failed to sync monitoring responses. Please check your internet connection and try again.
translations.kin: Kuhuza ibisubizo byo kugenzura byanze. Genzura ihuriro rya murandasi ryawe maze ugerageze nanone.

translations.en: Some components failed to sync: {{components}}. Please try again later.
translations.kin: Ibice bimwe byanze guhuza: {{components}}. Gerageza nanone nyuma.
Kugerageza ubugira kabiri amakosa ya murandasi ({{count}})
Byagenze neza guhuza {{count}} ibisubizo byo kugenzura

translations.en: Synced: {{synced}}, Failed: {{failed}}, Network Errors: {{networkError}}. Network error submissions will be retried on next sync.
translations.kin: Byahujwe: {{synced}}, Byanze: {{failed}}, Amakosa ya murandasi: {{networkError}}. Amakosa ya murandasi azongera kugeragezwa ku ihuza rikurikira.

translations.en: All {{count}} submissions encountered network errors. Please check your connection and try again.
translations.kin: {{count}} byose byoherejwe byagize amakosa ya murandasi. Genzura ihuriro ryawe maze ugerageze nanone.
Ikibazo cya interineti mu guhuza gukurikirana

translations.en: This submission already exists. Please check the submission details and try again.
translations.kin: Ibyoherejwe byoherejwe byakozwe kera. Ntago kongera kohereza ibyoherejwe.
